spec.expr:
_stream:{log.syslog.appname=fortigate,log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote}),fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,fgt.policytype=$policytype,network.direction in (${direction:doublequote})}
AND NOT fgt.logid:0000000020 AND fgt.action:($action) AND $Logsql
AND NOT fgt.srccountry:Reserved 
| stats by (fgt.srccountry) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{log.syslog.appname=fortigate,log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote}),fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,fgt.policytype=$policytype,network.direction in (${direction:doublequote})}
AND NOT fgt.logid:0000000020 AND fgt.action:($action) AND $Logsql
AND NOT fgt.dstcountry:Reserved 
| stats by (fgt.dstcountry) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{log.syslog.appname=fortigate,log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote}),fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,fgt.policytype=$policytype,network.direction in (${direction:doublequote})}
AND NOT fgt.logid:0000000020 AND fgt.action:($action) AND $Logsql
AND NOT fgt.srccountry:Reserved 
| stats by (fgt.srccountry) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 5

AND network.application:*
| stats by (network.application,fgt.utmaction) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc

_stream:{log.syslog.appname=fortigate,log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote}),fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,fgt.policytype=$policytype,network.direction in (${direction:doublequote})}
AND NOT fgt.logid:0000000020 AND fgt.action:($action) AND $Logsql

_stream:{log.syslog.appname=fortigate,log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote}),fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,fgt.policytype=$policytype,network.direction in (${direction:doublequote})}
AND NOT fgt.logid:0000000020 AND fgt.action:($action) AND $Logsql

| sort by (results) desc

_stream:{log.syslog.appname=fortigate,log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote}),fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,fgt.policytype=$policytype,network.direction in (${direction:doublequote})}
AND NOT fgt.logid:0000000020 AND fgt.action:($action) AND $Logsql
AND fgt.utmaction:*
| stats by (fgt.utmaction) count() results

_stream:{log.syslog.appname=fortigate,log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote}),fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,fgt.policytype=$policytype,network.direction in (${direction:doublequote})}
AND NOT fgt.logid:0000000020 AND fgt.action:($action) AND $Logsql
AND NOT fgt.utmaction:*
| stats count() results

options.content:
- **deny** - Session was denied
- **accept** - Allowed Forward session
- **start** - Session starts (log message was created when the session was created)
- **dns** - DNS query return error
- **ip-conn** - Failed connection attempts
- **close** - Local-traffic session allowed
- **timeout** - Allowed session was timeout
- **client-rst** - Session reset by client
- **server-rst** - Session reset by server

spec.description:
Custom LogsQL filter attached to every query.
Set to "*" to not filter.
See https://docs.victoriametrics.com/victorialogs/logsql/
spec.name: Logsql
